config.caveoverhaul.title: Cave Overhaul Settings
config.caveoverhaul.generate_caverns.too: Enable vanilla 1.18+ cavern generation. May cause terrain conflicts with Cave Overhaul's noise caves.
config.caveoverhaul.enable_lava_rivers.t: Generate underground lava rivers at low Y levels.
config.caveoverhaul.lava_offset.tooltip: Fill the bottom X air blocks of the world with lava. Adjust if bottom-of-world lava looks wrong.
config.caveoverhaul.cave_chance.tooltip: Probability that pre-1.18 style cave tunnels will spawn. (0.0 - 1.0)
config.caveoverhaul.cave_air_exposure.to: Probability that caves will carve through to the surface. (0.0 - 1.0)
config.caveoverhaul.cave_vertical_stretc: Stretches noise caves vertically. Higher values make caves taller and more vertical. (0.5 - 4.0)
Probability of canyons spawning in upper layers (y < 128 to bedrock). (0.0 - 1.0)
Probability of canyons spawning in lower layers (y < 48 to bedrock). (0.0 - 1.0)
Probability that canyons will carve through to the surface. (0.0 - 1.0)
